summary: New lore friendly player home for the Black Hand. Includes a couple of "special" items of loot.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]If you are like myself, you were a bit disappointed by the Dark Brotherhoods new "feel". They have essentially abandoned the Five tenets and the Black hand are no more. This Mod intends to bring them back.[/size]

For now, there is a Player home known as the Black Hand Repository. I've tried to keep this player home fairly minimalist rather than filling it with game breaking amounts of stuff. There are a couple of items of loot which I based on the Original Black hand which will add a bit more of a professional assassin feel, rather than rogue brawler. 

This mod will develop over the next few weeks but is fully playable now and I would appreciate feedback on any bugs which might surface. 

Future plans:

Black Hand faction Including NPC's
Custom meshes (all meshes are currently native content)
Better enchantments for custom items.
author: Thundorn
